name: Notion Postcrafter

features: Comprehensive Content Scheduling Overview.; Multiple views to track the status of each post.; Monthly, and Weekly Calendar Views for strategic scheduling.; Interactive Timeline View to master long-term content planning.; Quick Access Menu for effortless navigation and organization.; Collaborator & Sponsor Databases to streamline teamwork and partnerships.; Idea Repository to fuel your creativity and innovation.; Goal & Milestone Tracker to measure success and drive progress.
